author: atnqty
description: Make Hi Hungry I'm dad joke.
install_msg:
‚è∫ __**Hi Hungry**__
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load hihungry
2. Set maximum words with [p]hihungry maxlen <word num>
2. Set chance with [p]hihungry chance <float>
3. Toggle if it triggers only on single sentence message with [p]hihungry single.```
short: Make Hi Hungry I'm dad joke.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
